title: Blackjack
desc:
Post 1957
- **Countdown** 21
- While this card is in your hand, it automatically counts down by whichever die you roll. You still get to take your turn afterwards, so you can choose to put your die into this card a second time.
- If the **Countdown** reaches exactly 0, discard this card and gain 4 ðŸ˜ƒ **Happy**.
- If a die is placed on this card with a higher number than its remaining **Countdown**, you get **Destroyed**.
